message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think you'd be a perfect buyer. I'm asking for $200 to start.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Can you consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $200 is a fair starting point considering the value of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $185?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $185 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to go up to $175. Can you meet me there?
